name: ServerInfoHelper
description: The ServerInfoHelper class provides access to server information and connection details for multiplayer servers.
overview: The ServerInfoHelper class serves as a wrapper around server information, providing convenient access to server identification, player information, server status, network information, and NBT data. This class is particularly useful for server management scripts, server selection interfaces, and connection monitoring tools.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Gets the name of the server.

methods.name: getAddress
methods.description: Gets the IP address or hostname of the server.

methods.name: getPlayerCountLabel
methods.description: Gets the player count information as a text component.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Gets the label of the server description/MOTD.

methods.name: getPing
methods.description: Gets the server latency in milliseconds.

methods.name: getProtocolVersion
methods.description: Gets the protocol version number of the server, useful for determining client compatibility.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Gets the game version of the server as a text component.

methods.name: getPlayerListSummary
methods.description: Gets a summary list of players currently on the server.

methods.name: resourcePackPolicy
methods.description: Gets the resource pack policy status (e.g., ENABLED, DISABLED, PROMPT) as a translation key string.
examples:
const policy = serverInfo.resourcePackPolicy();
Chat.log(`Resource Pack Policy: ${policy}`);

methods.name: getIcon
methods.description: Gets the server icon data, typically as a Base64 string.

methods.name: isOnline
methods.description: Checks if the server is an online (remote) server.

methods.name: isLocal
methods.description: Checks if the server is a local (LAN) server.

methods.name: getNbt
methods.description: Gets the raw NBT data representation for the server info.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the server info object.
